description.@en: You obtain power, but at what cost? The eyes of your Daemon are fixated on you, judging you – eager to reward, or to punish.

effect.@en: You immediately gain a Disorder. In addition, select one of your Covenant's Aspects and replace your Order Alignment with it. Instead of gaining Fate Points, you may opt to gain a Daemonic Gift. Aspects and Daemonic Gifts are found in Chapter 6: Liber Umbrarum. When you generate face ‘6’ with Chaos Dice, you invoke a Chaos Manifestation. Furthermore, you must add 1 additional Chaos Die when Channeling Power. Finally, you must eat three meals a day or else suffer from Starvation (as outlined under Starvation from the Hazards & Healing chapter in ZWEIHÄNDER).
